definitions: (of a company, college, city, or other body) founded or having its rights and privileges established by means of a charter

examples.text: a survey was sent to 100 or the largest chartered corporations

definitions: (of an accountant, engineer, librarian, etc.) qualified as a member of a professional body that has a royal charter.
shortDefinitions: qualified as member of professional body that has royal charter

definitions: (of an aircraft, boat, or bus) having been rented for private use

examples.text: eighty journalists were flown in by chartered plane
